Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I was a bit confused with the lighting arrangement There was a lamp next to the door that switch on and off at random We couldn t find how to turn it off except of one that switched off all lamps in the room It wasn t a big deal though and have we stayed longer I guess we could just had asked the front desk
Positive_Review: The room was modern ample for Paris standards and well furnished The location is superb for anyone visiting Paris for its central attractions Louvre Champ Elysees Notre Dame all within easy walking distances

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The club room was a little on the small size but had everything we required
Positive_Review: Excellent location helpful and friendly staff free safe and air conditioning we would certainly return

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Room was a bit small but it did just fine
Positive_Review: Hotel staff was very nice and helpful Location was great with a short walk to both the Louvre Orsay and two metro stops very close by

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing will book again without hesitation
Positive_Review: Great location really friendly and helpful staff in perfect location to walk to any of the major attractions

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Incredible location within walking distance to all the main tourist hotspots Staff were very friendly and helpful Room was extremely comfortable and very clean Highly recommended

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Maybe a bit more light in the bathroom wonderful 5 day stay
Positive_Review: Bed fabulous AC wonderful Quiet sleeping Bathroom clean and amenities nice The STAFF was exceptionally helpful friendly and kind The breakfast was excellent fresh food delicious dried fruit juices coffee so wonderful

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Paris is expensive hence this as a 4 hotel also seems expensive but it is I think reasonable in context We had a very pleasant and enjoyable stay The hotel is thoughtfully and tastefully arranged with good attention to detail and the staff were very friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Hotel D Orsay is in a very convenient location a quiet street just a half block from the Seine It s easy walking distance to the Louvre Place de la Concorde and the heart of St Germain as well as to several Metro stations The staff is extremely friendly and welcoming Each time we came back to the hotel it was like coming home Our room was also a good size bigger than what I had expected for Paris It was nicely and comfortably furnished in a homey way you will definitely not feel like you re in a chain hotel here Overall we had an excellent stay and would definitely come back next time we re in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The shuttle to CDG is 60 so we took the train for 10 each The train is so easy and right across the street
Positive_Review: We had an very quiet room with a small garden view The staff was very gracious and accommodated our lack of ability to speak French The location is central with easy access to all of Paris I only wish I could go back again next year

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast wasn t amazing and the breakfast room was very hot with stuffy air The room was tiny even though it was supposed to be deluxe which isn t the smallest available with the toilet door right next to the bed Although we asked for a twin room what we got was a room with two single beds pushed together so we had to move the furniture ourselves to put some space in between the beds which made the room even smaller
Positive_Review: The best location possible Easy access to main attractions transport shopping areas and of course restaurants

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The area is very quiet with a lack of bars shops etc We loved it but may not be suitable for people who want the hustle and bustle of the city Also a smell of drains in the area which is very common everywhere in Paris Not the Hotels fault obviously but a bit off putting
Positive_Review: The location was fantastic Walking distance to the Eiffel Tower Louvre and Notre Dame Just off the Seine its in the street behind the Musee D Orsay EXCELLENT bus and train links just around the corner too The hotel staff were amazing and couldn t do enough for you The accommodation was classic and immaculate and we were driven a free upgrade to a triple room which gave us even more space The photos online are very accurate Breakfast was served from 7 11 and the choice available was outstanding We have never been to Paris before and we re so glad to have chosen this hotel over all the others due to its location and class

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Comfortable and spacious room nice bed linens and luxurious towels Helpful and attentive staff super location Lacked nothing for comfort

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Size of the room but this is Paris so it was as expected
Positive_Review: The location is outstanding staff is truly helpful Room is well equipped and very quiet Breakfast was nice good selection and price in terms of Paris is good Overal a great choice

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff were sensational they went out of their way to accomodate all of our needs The hotel is situated near main attractions and great restaurants

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: There is plenty of storage soace for folded clothes but not much for clothes on hangers Also it took until the second day to find the mini safe which is in the bathroom on the right side of the clothes closet I probably should have asked oh well
Positive_Review: The staff at hotel D Orsay were very welcoming kind considerate and helpful I choose a hotel by the size cleanliness and quality of the bathrooms and in this hotel they were superb Large bathtub with a nice shower two sinks full length mirror clean white ties and marble floor If you re European and expect a bidet my room did not have one but I think most Americans do not expect a bidet The Windows opened put into a beautiful square solarium type garden which was quite beautiful The heating system worked perfectly so you could be warm all through the night when you sleep I especially liked all the antique furniture and real paintings on the wall Great USB chargers in the bedside night lamps so you only need to bring the cord without the plug I was near the elevator but never actually heard so the room was peaceful and quiet Although it was nice to hear the birds in the morning Breakfast had very healthy choices and I love the fact that they had s diner delivery service from I be uneven a nearby restaurant The neighborhood is safe and well lighted and 2 minutes from musee D Orsay and othe interesting sites I would definitely say there again I arrived to the hotel by public transportation which cost 10 plus the visit of a subway ticket and then it was a short 5 mi use walk to the hotel When I left I you d the airport shutle taxi for 60 to CDG just see above ground how far away the airport was With no traffic it s 30 minute With intense traffic it takes 1 hour 10 minutes

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: For Paris very large room well appointed Excellent location right behind Musee d Orsay close to Blvd St Germain 3 Minutes to Seine Lots of great restaurants bars in immediate neighbourhoud

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I filter by parking but to my disappointment no parking is provided but a 40 day public parking 10 min away was offered instead
Positive_Review: Staff excellent service

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff superb location super comfortable bed even had evening turn down service with little chocolates placed in our pillows Very clean and we had a very roomy room by European standards

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Our room was on the second floor and window was facing the street so there was some noise coming from the street in the mornings Though the street is quite quiet most of the time
Positive_Review: Very friendly and helpful staff Delicious breakfast fresh bakery and very good coffee Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Could not fault Hotel d Orsay for anything Everything was excellent
Positive_Review: Staff were amazing so genuinely helpful and well mannered could not do enough for you The excellent location was well worth the price Public transport an easy walk away We made it from the airport with ease apart from the steps we had to climb with baggage and traveled to Disneyland as well We had a family room for 2 adults and 1 8yr old child it was plenty spacious Small fridge and tea coffee setup and biscuits were welcome extras Highly recommended to all A

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Room number 10 Location of television is very bad I hit my head many times It s location should be at the wall of the other side
Positive_Review: Hospitality at the reception

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This hotel was in the perfect location There was easy access to all the major sites via the underground which was a very short walk While being central to the major attractions the actual hotel was located in a more quiet and well maintained part of the city

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The location is fantastic and the hotel well refurbished but the size of room is not comfortable for a long stay and two luggages The bathroom and shower was very good
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I didn t like how the card is pre charged Card details should only be to reserve the room In this case I booked but my father in law wanted to pay This made it difficult
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Club rooms on top of the hotel have some view on Eiffel tower but these rooms are rather small The night concierge is not friendly at all
Positive_Review: Very good location for exploring the city especially Louvre and Orsay and nice clean modern rooms with very good toileteries Very convenient to get to the hotel from the airport with Uber only 36EUR takes approx an hour

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The room was unbearably hot since the cool air was not turned on yet it s still winter and must be a European thing because we found this in all our hotels and we couldn t sleep with the window open due to street noise
Positive_Review: The staff was the best part friendly and helpful with tips about the city The location was excellent and the room had almost everything we needed

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff was extremely helpful The linens and bed including pillows were very fine and exceptionally comfortable It was nice to eat the chocolate treats left at the front desk

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Rooms a little small but probably normal for this part of Paris
Positive_Review: Excellent location in the 7th very professional and helpful staff Good breakfast too

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Needed an extra luggage stand but to be fair we did not ask for one
Positive_Review: Staff at front desk were very friendly and helpful Beds comfortable Breakfast with good variety well served Room very quiet Very nice updated bathroom Absolutely excellent location for nearness to museums and attractions Felt safe walking in area even late at night

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Excellent experience through and through Absolutely impressed by the care and the professionalism of the young gentleman at the reception

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The hallways carpeting and the doors look old my room club was pretty small
Positive_Review: The bed bathroom location is great for the price it s a great boutique hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Hotel needs renovation because in my opinion for same money it should be in much better condition Same as everything in Paris the price is double compare to other lovely cities worldwide in same quality
Positive_Review: Very friendly staff at reception Good location to get almost all important places in Paris by walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Room is small so a bit hard to move around with 2 big luggages
Positive_Review: The location is perfect just beside the Musee d Orsay There is small Carrefour shop around the corner 3 min walk to Metro subway I can see top of Eiffel tower and Notre Dame roof from my window Staff super friendly and free chocolate on the reception desk

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: We took a club room which is like a small double and is cheaper than a standard room Free Nespresso coffee in the lobby and an honesty bar

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The bed was a bit small for us 1 40 mtr but we got used to it after a few nights
Positive_Review: Very pleasant staff very friendly and helpful Clean hotel in a quiet street Very close to the Seine and plenty of restaurants within a short walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff was friendly Appreciated the hotel contacting us about transportation from the airport When the 1 room was too small the staff arranged another room

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: What didn t I like uhm well the Kettle in room slow and nowhere convenient to plug in that is the ONLY thing I can think of to put in the What didn t you like box so basically everything was great
Positive_Review: Room staff location

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The bed was very comfortable the room a little small but nicely decorated and top clean and excellent quality of the linen There is a honesty bar downstairs and the great coffee is free Great location Most of the Paris highlights are in walking distance

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast buffet was a bit on the small side
Positive_Review: The service was excellent and the staff couldn t do enough to help us The location of the hotel is perfect so close to the Champs lys es Louvre shopping tour Eiffel metro station etc The hotel itself was charming and it was lovely to stay in a more personalised and smaller place rather than a hotel chain

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: My wife and I had a standard room which was a little short on storage space while my children had a Superior Suite not sure how that happened which was excellent with everything needed Breakfast was a little expensive there is no restaurant at the hotel but this is no problem as we walked 200 yards down the road to one of the many excellent bakery cafes for breakfast
Positive_Review: My family spent the week before Christmas 2016 at the hotel and it was one of the best we have had We got an excellent deal on the rooms making it very good value for money Location outstanding A 200 yards from Musee D Orsay and Metro A short walk from Louvre Notre Dame Hotel Des Invalides Eiffel Tower Latin Qaurter and Champs Elysees Hotel beds very comfortable rooms a little warm but even in mid winter we could open the window and the street is so quiet we could sleep well Staff excellent with in our case good English

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Wifi was weak and intermittent We were staying on the first floor so there should not have been a problem
Positive_Review: The staff was fantastic Super friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The Wi Fi was not working during our 4 day stay Internet connectivity was either not available or so slow as to be useless The cost of the breakfast 18 per person was ridiculous but at least there are several cafes within 2 or 3 minutes walk 14 90 for two breakfasts at the Caf de Mus e for example
Positive_Review: The room was large and quiet and there was little noise from inside the hotel The bed was wide and very comfortable

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast was good not spectacular for 18 so we ate out nearby bistros are not much cheaper but you get what you want
Positive_Review: Staff were super helpful Room for three was large by Paris standards Location cetnral between Eiffel Notre Dame Quiet location relatively

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: We really enjoyed our stay a very clean spacious and nicely appointed room Appreciated the plentiful and good quality toiletries in room coffee tea water nice and reasonably priced minibar The staff were all very courteous pleasant and helpful We will choose this hotel for any further trips to Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great location for what we wanted to do Bed not clean but they made up for it Nice and friendly staff and they arranged a shuttle to the airport for us too It was a white knuckle ride but not hotels fault Elevator Ice Fancy key ring Refrigerator Close to RER as well

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Breakfast was 18 euros per person for a regular continental breakfast buffet
Positive_Review: Hotel is perfectly located very clean and rooms are nice and cozy with an 18th century vibe We even got upgraded at check in to a superior room for free

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Expensive but maybe that s Paris Wifi too slow for videos at times was the only other small issue
Positive_Review: Lovely foyer and the whole hotel was beautiful The staff were very nice and accommodating Wonderful location and area

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: For the price we paid for the Junior Suite breakfast could have been included Better child friendly restaurant recommendations would have been appreciated The bistros we were recommended were lovely but not suitable for children The hotel recommended car transfer service would not have been needed if reception had been more encouraging about taking the metro it was very simple once we figured it out
Positive_Review: Great location and friendly staff The Junior Suite Room 60 was lovely and a great size for our family of 4 2 adults and 2 seven year olds Musee D Orsay metro station and the museum itself are a couple of minutes walk away The metro line takes you to the Tower Eiffel and Notre Dame within a couple of stops or less It was easy taking a metro to Gare Du Nord one stop to Notre Dame change line and then about 4 stops to Gare du Nord We would have done this if the hotel had not advised us to order a more costly car transfer service instead of taking the metro There are some lovely bistros within walking distance It is also walking distance to central sites like the Louvre

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: I was in a club room It was a little small but that was ok as I was travelling solo For two people might be a bit of a squeeze so would recommend paying a little more for a bigger room
Positive_Review: Lovely traditional Parisian hotel Staff were so friendly helpful and welcoming In walki g distance from the musuem d orsay and from the metro Lovely breakfast Would definitely stay here again

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: the room including the bathroom were spacious and comfortable The help yourself bar was relaxing and well stocked The recommendation for restaurants was wonderful

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: A great cozy hotel right next to the d Orsay Museum opposite the Tuileries Garden Yet the quartier is quite and authentic with almost no tourists at all The room was a little bit small but had great bathroom and all the facilities Even a book on a night table to read some pages before you fall asleep Fantastic staff and truly Parisian atmosphere I enjoyed my stay and would recommend this hotel Would love to stay again

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Wifi signal in room was not very good Breakfast should be included in that price Everything else perfect i would go there again
Positive_Review: Elegant hotel very polite and helpful staff excellent location very clean hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The room was typical Parisian compact but beautifully furnished and the bed was of high quality and very comfortable The Reception team could not be faulted and we re always on hand to assist with restaurant bookings and directions Check in and out was efficient and bag storage was provided to allow us to enjoy our final day in the city It s location is perfect for a short break within easy walking distance of museums bars restaurants and shops We highly recommend for a short leisure break

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: At check in without my permission making a colouted print copy of my Amex card including the ccv code He tried to do this after I had already paid for the stay with the credit card using the pin machine He did not know where I could park for a day When checking out no one asked how our stay was Paris or not hotels expecting guests from all over the world should have normal kungsize beds This bed was much too small for 2 people My petite daughter and I are far from large We pay to sleep for 2 Stayed in the 6th floor with an elevator to the 5th so you have to walk 2 flights of stairs
Positive_Review: Wash gels

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: It just happened that the hotel airconditioning was broken the day I checked in I could not continue my stay in this hotel and swithed to another after staying all night awake It is a 4 star hotel rated 9 in the booking com whereas I found more comfort and bigger rooms bigger hotel excellent location same price in another 4 star hotel rated 8
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff were super friendly and helpful and they didn t mind listening to my poorly spoken French They were gracious There was a lift to our floor The location was perfect a stroll to the Place de Concorde and the Champs Elysee and almost next to the Musee D Orsay The mini bar was awesome for a catchup with other family also staying in the hotel They had a shuttle service from the airport Breakfast was absolutely delicious The room was modern and shower absolutely the best of our 5 week trip better than the Sofitel in London

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Stayed August 2016 at the Penthouse Suite Just beautiful clean exactly as pictured King bed was amazing 2 twins bed in adjacent room 2 balconies Left Bank location perfect Staff amazing

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Everything The staff very friendly and helpful with suggestions for dining and points of interest very comfortable quiet clean and excellent facilities Lovely toiletries and bathrobes Great location and excellent staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This hotel is located within reasonable walking distance of many attractions It is in a quiet neighborhood many excellent cafes within a few blocks The staff are fluent in English and very helpful Our stay there gave us an authentic Parisian experience since the rubbed elbows with so many locals in the cafes

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: It was absolutely outstanding Sebastian and the other staff were first rate and constantly went to any length to assist Location was perfect and as our honeymoon stay they even organised a bottle of champagne in our room upon arrival A across the board

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We didn t have the breakfast as we were always happy to get on the move but the breakfast room did seem a little sad given the quality of the rooms and reception areas
Positive_Review: This hotel is wonderfully positioned to explore Paris but feels secluded and tucked away The room and bathroom were well decorated with sumptuous curtains to aid a good night s sleep The towels bathrobes and toiletries were good quality Staff were very genuine and could not have been more friendly or helpful I will definitely be returning

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: This was undeniably one of the best places we have ever stayed at Charming hotel great decor big rooms with great amenities and toiletries Staff were all fantastic incredibly helpful and welcoming Also at a fantastic location within walking distance to most attractions Definitely recommend

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I loved the location as it was in walking distance to all main attractions especially the louvre and musee D Orsay The staff were all amazing friendly and attentive The room had exposed heritage beams and great views ventilation Bed super comfy and bathroom the biggest we had in Paris The supplied toiletries were beautiful and generous Breakfast had a good range and really pleasant to kick off the day I ll certainly stay again

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: A wonderful hotel with a convenient location and very friendly staff Clean and spacious room for two people The staff are always ready to help resolve all the questions of the guests Special thanks and greetings to Molkeire I am pleased to visit this hotel again and will recommend it to our friends

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Close to many attractions and the metro but Hotel d Orsay an oasis of calm and comfort Staff are welcoming but not overpowering The decor wonderful bedding bathroom layout and supplies all made for a very pleasant stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Fantastic location and wonderful helpful staff really helped make our trip I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone that wants to stay a few days in Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Beds were a little hard not uncommon in Europe though Temperature was hard to control in the one room we had on an upper floor
Positive_Review: Really friendly staff helped us with a difficult situation when our youngest daughter accidentally spilled ink on the carpet and did not charge us We are very appreciative Also the bathrooms were very nice with lots of free quality toiletries and a real hairdryer

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Overall extremely happy with my stay everything was above expectations from the charming spacious and comfortable bedroom to the professional friendly and knowledgeable staff Will certainly be returning

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I stayed here for the second time Very nice hotel located in the center of the Paris just 3 min walk from Musee D Orsay The hotel matches with romantic atmosphere of St Germain where it s situated Rooms are spacious good breakfast The staff is kind and very polite

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The room was comfortable and spacious We thought the breakfast excellent Superb location near the river and art galleries and lots of very good restaurants close by One of the nicest places we have stayed in Paris We will be back

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Nothing comes to my mind I didn t like
Positive_Review: I asked for quiet room and I got one I asked for iron because of my business shirts and they brought it to the room with desk it wasn t used The furniture is modern the bed is comfortable the rooms have a good design It is good to relax in the evening The location is perfect 1 minute from RER stop Mus e d Orsay The staff is really friendly welcomes you all the time helps in everything 10 10

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The staff at the hotel or tremendously helpful during my visit They help me get tickets to the museum d Orsay and helped me make dinner reservations on a river cruise boat

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Location is perfect but other hotels have this too This hotel has exceptionally friendly staff and services above average for Paris I will certainly be back

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Wifi wasn t the fastest but still worked just fine
Positive_Review: The staff were the friendliest people in Paris Their airport transfer were brilliant efficient and value for money Situated in a nice location near the Seine and close to the metro

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: It would be possible to update the carpet in the room
Positive_Review: Excellent location within walking distance of major attractions Versailles 30 minutes by G G direct Attentive staff Lovely French breakfast Quiet and cozy Excellent self service bar for a reasonable price Thank you all

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: The hotel is located between the Eiffel Tower and the Gare de Lyon so it makes a good base for people traveling by train for visiting the sights of paris A metro station is nearby 100 150m and the Louvre is in walking distance

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Service at reception desk was wonderful they paid attention to all my needs booked me tickets to exibitions recomended very good restaurantes gave me an additional equipment for improving internet in my room Breakfast is appeares expensive but it is worth every penny very luxury start of the day with broad choice of diifferent food

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: I love this Hotel Hotel Room Service The hotel itself is very cosy and comfy stayed in room 052 on the fifth floor and the room was beautiful and just like the pictures on the website comfy double bed Free WiFi size of the room was comfy specially in a city as Paris where rooms are tiny with a balcony just like I requested minibar espresso machine tea kettle with tea fresh complimentary water flat screen TV relaxing bathroom with all needed amenities Hotel was very quiet and relaxing at all times Room service was wonderful and kept my room super clean at all times Tried their laundry service and it was useful and they took care of my jeans despite me requesting for it late at night As I stayed there during Christmas I got a complementary bottle of Champagne on arrival I was given the choice between it and fruits of course I went with Champagne considering its Christmas in Paris as well as Chocolates on Christmas eve along with handwritten cards which I appreciated Staff absolutely wonderful staff special thanks to the wonderful ladies as well as Riza always willing to help English speaking very friendly professional and respectful always smiling they really were a pleasure to deal with and helped me many times Location great location right next to the Musee d Orsay few steps away from the RER the Louvre is around 5 7 mins walk away infact most touristic places are easily accessible from it wither by foot or RER Cabs can easily also reach it since its next to the muse d Orsay There are several restaurants and cafes and supermarket around it 2 3mins away so you have everything you need Breakfast I tried their breakfast twice and I enjoyed it yet keep in mind that the menu doesn t change Scrambled eggs sausage bacon croissants and bread Coffee Tea juices

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No concierge Says breakfast is required to be payed for regardless but when you check out it wasn t A little pricey at 18 a person but good
Positive_Review: Very helpful staff Went out and purchased gluten free items for breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Only small things shower head too large so hard to get enough heat and poor room service
Positive_Review: Bijoux great little hotel excellent value for the location Staff lovely great design perfect location

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The closet was in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Very charming hotel loved it I booked a Superior Doubleroom quite big and lovely decor Delicious breakfast Perfect location

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No provision of replacement complimentary products ie milk etc and toiletries on one day very minor flaw in otherwise perfect stay
Positive_Review: Ambience location and staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Fantastic location for a business trip or just a fun weekend in Paris spotless and very chic room friendly helpful staff delicious fresh baguettes at breakfast and free wifi ten out of ten from me

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Very well located right by the Musee D Orsay and just the other side of the river from the Tuileries and Louvre Very comfortable room excellent breakfast and friendly staff We ll be back

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We had breakfast in the hotel restaurant on the last day of our stay The food was fine but we felt that the restaurant lacked a little atmosphere
Positive_Review: We came to Paris to celebrate our silver wedding anniversary The hotel managent very kindly upgraded our room to mark the occasion This was a very nice gesture and made an excellent start to our break

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Great staff and location Breakfast has many choices On a quiet street two blocks from a Main Street Don t hesitate to stay here I would book again in a heartbeat Staff is top notch

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: Everything was fine next time I will however book a standard room and not a club one worth the extra money
Positive_Review: Perfect central location comfortable room quiet even if central free Wifi very helpful staff PC and printer in the lobby also very useful could print the boarding passes

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The club rooms are indeed very small as advertised In the future we would probably pay a little more for a bigger room
Positive_Review: The location is excellent It s on a quiet street but very close to many of Paris s sites and to numerous dining opportunities

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: It was difficult to control the air conditioning and I thought the room a little too cold for my liking I would have like to turn the aircon off but that didn t seem possible
Positive_Review: Staff were very friendly and helpful and professional Bed was very very comfortable Lots of nice towels Good Wifi Room sizes were good for Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: They are doing some renovation works but are trying and succeeding to compensate any inconvenience one may have because of it
Positive_Review: Great location exceptionally kind helpful and smiling staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: No wash hand basin in WC of double room Breakfast more expensive than average
Positive_Review: Very polite friendly helpful staff pleasant relaxed atmosphere great location comfortable rooms very satisfactory breakfast with high quality of bread and a wide choice of foods Free bottled water a bonus

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: The wifi was a bit of a pain and slow the room was really small but that is normal for paris
Positive_Review: location and effective staff they were even friendly which is a miracle for France

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Positive_Review: Staff very friendly and helpful and location ideal

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
Negative_Review: We liked everything Would definitely come back
Positive_Review: Everything was great Beautiful small hotel in excellent location friendly staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel d Orsay Esprit de France
